channel.title: 🏢 University of Liège on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 University of Liège on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Learning Diffusion Priors from Observations by Expectation Maximization
item.description: This research introduces an Expectation-Maximization algorithm to train diffusion models from incomplete and noisy data, enabling their use in data-scarce scientific applications.
